rBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody:
Honor virtus et potestas et imperium sit
trinitati in unitate unitati in trinitate trinitatis in unitate unitati in trinitate trinitati unicae unitati trinae in perenni saeculorum
tempore tempora

vBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

verses.vBody:
Trinitati lux perennis Trinitatis lux perenni Trinitati laus perennis Trinitati lux perenni
unitati unitatis sit decus
perpetim perpeti

rep.wit: CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

verses.prosula: In perpetuum benedictum est nomen Dei aeterni simulque et Filio et Spiritui Sancto
